name: HEXION
description: TRANSCEND YOUR MEATBAG SOLDIER! Join the battle for superiority across the solar system and beyond. In this competitive VR multiplayer shooter you will be tested on your speed, accuracy, and ability to cooperate. APPLY NOW!
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7/8.1/10 (64 bit) Processor: Intel Core i5 Sandy Bridge or equivalent Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GTX 970 or equivalent Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 2 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7/8.1/10 (64 bit) Processor: Intel Core i7 Skylake or equivalent Memory: 16 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1070 or equivalent Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 2 GB available space
